original_text: And they shall be spread before the sun and the moon and all the host of heaven, which they have loved and served, which they have gone after, and which they have sought and worshiped. And they shall not be gathered or buried. They shall be as dung on the surface of the ground.
korean_text: 그들이 사랑하며 섬기며 뒤따르며 구하며 경배하던 해와 달과 하늘의 뭇 별 아래에서 펼쳐지게 하리니 그 뼈가 거두이거나 묻히지 못하여 지면에서 분토 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: before the sun and the moon
and all the host of heaven
which they have loved and served
and which they have sought and worshiped
And they shall not be gathered or buried
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 거두어지거나 묻히지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They shall be as dung on the surface of the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅 표면의 오물 같이 될 것입니다
